column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Overall we had a great time and will venture out our comfort zone to eat here. The reason i cannot give this place 5 stars is for the sneezing guest next to me
column2: our food basically coming out all at once which made it difficult to enjoy the meal without it getting cold as quick as it did
column3: and my chashu was very scarce. Reviewing the images on yelp made me feel like Jinya tricked me as my two piece of chashu
column5: did not add up to even one of the piece in the images I've seen.
